mapper.sql: select t.id id, t.name name, t.mobile mobile, t.cert_type certType, t.cert_no certNo, t.user_id userId, t.cust_no custNo, t.user_no userNo, t.is_auth_real_name isAuthRealName, t.create_user_id createUserId, t.modify_user_id modifyUserId, t.mchn_parent mchnParent, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.cust_id custId, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM `t_gq_fss_customer` t
mapper.select:
SELECT bankCard.id id, bankCard.user_no userNo, customer.name name, customer.mobile mobile, customer.cert_type certType, customer.cert_no certNo, bankCard.bank_id bankId, bankCard.card_no cardNo, bankCard.area area, bankCard.bank_id_third bankIdThire, customer.create_time createTime, customer.modify_time modifyTime FROM `t_gq_fss_bank_card_info` bankCard ,`t_gq_fss_customer` customer,`t_gq_fss_bank_list` bank where bankCard.bank_id=bank.id
and customer.name like concat('%',${name},'%')
and bankCard.card_no like concat('%',${cardNo},'%')
and bank.sort_name like concat('%',${bankSortName},'%')
order by customer.create_time desc

SELECT bankCard.id id, bankCard.user_no userNo, customer.name name, customer.mobile mobile, customer.cert_type certType, customer.cert_no certNo, bankCard.bank_id bankId, bankCard.card_no cardNo, bankCard.area area, customer.create_time createTime, customer.modify_time modifyTime FROM `t_gq_fss_bank_card_info` bankCard ,`t_gq_fss_customer` customer where bankCard.user_no=customer.id and customer.id=${id} order by customer.create_time desc

SELECT t.id id, t.cust_no custNo, t.name name, t.mobile mobile, t.cert_type certType, t.cert_no certNo, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_customer t
AND t.mobile Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{mobile}),'%')
AND t.cert_no Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{certNo}),'%')
AND t.name Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and date_format(t.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= #{startTime}
and date_format(t.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= #{endTime}
order by t.create_time desc
